article_title: Peter King: Cruz Supporters Represent 'Dark Strain' in American Politics
comment_texts:
I have a suggestion to Breitbart and Drudgereport....publish all names and photos
of all the despicable RINOs who supported Reid. I will bet that most of them
are your old establishment Repubs who are threatened by the youth of the new
real "conservative" senators like Cruz. McCain, McConnell and the rest of them
don't want to be challenged. This is why our country is so screwed up because 
of old politicians who are hanging on to power so desperately, serving only
themselves. Let us clean it up and bring in NEW BLOOD of REAL conservatives.

explanation: The comment does not mention global warming
The comment does not mention fossil fuels
The comment does not mention God
The comment does not mention church
The comment does not mention Obama
The comment does not mention Trump
The comment mentions 'new real conservative senators like Cruz', indicating a positive view of conservative Republicans
The comment mentions 'despicable RINOs who supported Reid', indicating a negative view of Democrats and Republicans who support them
The comment does not mention immigration
The comment does not mention taxes
The comment does not mention European Union
The comment does not mention Social Security
The comment does not mention Harry Potter
The comment does not mention soccer
